corner 3 single_crochet in marked chain and pm in 2nd single_crochet of the chain 100 100 104 104 104 108 108 108 108 108 set repeat from * around single_crochet in rem chs skip the tch and and chain of the round yellow marker and in last single_crochet of the round made and counting from right to left pm in the pink marker photo 14 turn photo 15 108 108 following chs to mark the corner increase points 112 112 112 116 116 116 116 116 st 18 34 68 84 20 34 70 84 20 34 72 86 22 keep moving corner markers up as you go 32 74 84 24 32 76 84 24 30 78 84 24 32 after turning the yellow marker will always be 78 86 24 34 78 88 24 34 78 88 24 32 78 on your right-hand side and the pink marker 86 will always be on your left-hand side you now have 35 37 39 43 45 49 47 45 45 47 sts incl marked corner points on each front and back panel and 15 13 13 9 7 5 7 9 9 7 sts excl marked corner points on each sleeve panel do not remove these starting markers until you get to the turtleneck go to
